snippet: Julio Borges of Primero Justicia, Venezuela’s main opposition group, and John Peeler, a professor of Latin American studies at Bucknell, respond to an Op-Ed article by President Nicolás Maduro.
lead_paragraph: Julio Borges of Primero Justicia, Venezuela’s main opposition group, and John Peeler, a professor of Latin American studies at Bucknell, respond to an Op-Ed article by President Nicolás Maduro.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
